mapper.update: CREATE TABLE if not exists `stock` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `stock_num` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '股票编码', `stock_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '股票名称', `high` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最高价', `low` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最低价', `open` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '开盘价', `close` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '收盘价', `pre_close` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '昨收盘价', `turn_overrate` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '换手率', `amplitude` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '振幅，一天最大涨幅-最小涨幅', `up_down_prices` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '涨跌额度', `up_down_range` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '涨幅', `up_down_range3` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '3日涨幅', `up_down_range5` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '5日涨幅', `volume` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '成交量', `amount` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '成交额', `flow_market_value` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '流通市值', `total_flow_shares` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '流通股', `total_market_value` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '总市值', `total_shares` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '总股本', `quantity_relative_ratio` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '量比', `industry` varchar(255) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '行业', `plate` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '板块', `belong_plate` varchar(2048) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '所属板块', `listing_date` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '上市时间', `update_date` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', `attribute` text DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '扩展', `favorite` int DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '是否收藏中', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_stock_num` (`stock_num`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
mapper.select: select COUNT(CASE WHEN up_down_range > 0 THEN 1 END) upSize, COUNT(CASE WHEN 0>up_down_range THEN 1 END) downSize from stock

select * from (select industry, COUNT(CASE WHEN up_down_range > 0 THEN 1 END) upSize, COUNT(CASE WHEN 0 > up_down_range THEN 1 END) downSize, count(*) allSize from stock group by industry) t order by upSize/allSize desc
select * from stock a where not exists(select * from stock b where a.industry = b.industry and b.total_market_value > a.total_market_value)
